content.detailedDescription:
on 3/18/14 at approximately 2020 hours, i witnessed 2 black triangular objects in the sky near interstate 680 at state route 46 in austintown, ohio.
	while traveling east on i-76 crossing over the meander creek reservoir bridge i observed two orange lights in the sky at a distance.  the two lights did not seem to be moving but rather stationary.  as i came closer to the s.R. 46 overpass i noticed that the lights were slightly moving.  after i crossed under the overpass, i looked up and to the left (north) and observed two black triangles to be seemingly gliding at about 200-330 feet off the ground.  upon further observation i also noticed the second triangle to be approximately 30-50 feet behind the first and slightly higher.  both black triangles were gliding without any noise; not typical for flying objects, especially this low to the ground.  the objects were also making a slight left turn (north) passing over s.R. 46.  
	i observed the objects to be a black triangle traveling with the flat end forward and the point to the rear.  the front two corners each had an orange light, with no light on the rear tip.  both objects appeared to be the same in size, color, and flight.  after turning around approximately a half mile down the road on i-680, i returned to the area of s.R. 46 at i-680 (approximately 1-2 minutes) and did not see the objects again.  i remained in the area for another twenty minutes but did not see anything else.
	the temperature at time of observation was approximately 40 degrees fahrenheit, partly cloudy skies, but clear in the viewing area, no precipitation.  winds were approximately 4 mi/h blowing southeast.  the area of observation was well light with building and streetlights, and contained heavy amounts of traffic.  i am free of drugs, alcohol, and any mental or physical illnesses, 33 years old, a military veteran of 9 years, and police officer of 11 years.
content.summary: 2 black triangles with two orange lights each

content.detailedDescription:
during the summer of 2010, while on working in the city of campbell, ohio, i witnessed what i believe to have been four ufo���s.  i���ll try to provide as much information as possible from what i recall.  during the summer months, sometime toward the evening (clear skies), between 5:00pm-7:00pm, while traveling west on us-422 i was stopped at the red light intersecting 12th st. while stopped, i noticed directly to my front, in the distance, what appeared to be 3 small, yellow-shiny objects in a row.  what really caught my attention as unusual is that these objects where not moving.  i then turned south onto 12th st. then right onto my street, porter ave, to stop home.  when i pulled in the driveway and exited my vehicle, i noticed in the western sky the same 3 objects.  (my house from the intersection of 12th st. and us-422 in less than a mile).

     as i was watching the objects, the middle one slowly began to drop as the right object moved left and the left object started to arch upwards to the right.  the objects moved very slowly and precise, unlike any flying vehicle i have ever witnessed.  then off to the left another object caught my eye that had the same characteristics of the other three.  but this object just stayed off to the left, not moving, but apparently observing the other three. 

     after the three objects finished moving and were in a straight line again they began to either move off into the distance until disappearing or they stayed in the same spot and just faded out.
content.summary: $ shiney objects

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting on the beach, about 100 meters north of danabeach resort in da nang, vietnam.
 
we were sitting and talking for about 10 minutes or so when suddenly she saw something in the sky directly overhead that instantly caught her attention as strange. the time then was 6:45 pm. she mentioned immediately after the first sighting that she 'felt' something strange was happening above her, and she was compelled to look up.

i looked up as well and my jaw instantly hung wide open, shocked and a bit scared at what i was seeing. it was a very large boomerang shaped craft moving at a steady speed and straight line to the north, towards son tra mountain. 

instantly i could tell this was something strange, and my mind started racing to try and identify what this thing was. it didn't fit anything i've seen in the sky before. 

the object appeared extremely large, but it was also totally silent and had no lights whatsoever. my first reaction was that this thing was a kite someone had lost their grip on and was blowing over our heads. 

i quickly realized that this was no kite, because of it's shape and altitude. there were two layers of clouds that evening, one low marine layer type sporadic clouds, and one blanket cloud cover at a very high, upper atmosphere level that covered part of the sky, especially to the north. 

the object appeared below the top layer of clouds, but well above the bottom layer. the outline was clearly visible when contrasting the top layer of clouds. it had a perfect boomerang shape. when passing in front of stars, it blacked them out. 

the color was a greyish white and actually looked almost 'smoky' like it had some kind of 'active camoflauge'. it appeared to be a craft that was designed not to be seen.

it maintained a steady, smooth speed as it passed overhead to the north and we lost sight of it as it blended in to the cloud cover towards the mountain. the sighting of the first craft lasted about 10 or 15 seconds. 

we were totally awestruck by this, and immediately started trying to figure out what it could have been. i was racking my brain trying to come up with some logical explanation but it just didn't fit anything i've ever seen in the sky. 

i've been in dozens of airplanes in my life, big and small, i'm a skydiver, i'm a climber with lots of experience with high altitudes and weird looking cloud formations. this was nothing i could explain, no matter how hard i tried. 

the shape was too perfect. it was at an altitude where there were no other clouds. though it was similar in color, it contrasted to the clouds that were in the sky. it was moving too fast. it had no lights at all. 

if it were an airplane of some kind, it's relative size was too big. to look that big it would have to be flying at like 100 meters or something and would have been extremely loud. this thing was dead silent. 

the size, speed, perfect shape, altitude, lack of lights, clear straight line flight path... all of this didn't add up to any aircraft i've ever heard of. 

da nang has a pretty active airport, right near the beach where we were. there are both commercial and military planes and helicopters flying overhead commonly every day. we've seen all of these and are familiar with them. 

i should mention that the skies were busy with air traffic that night, which is normal. there were no planes that seemed to interact with the craft we saw, and they looked like the normal blinking lights that we see everyday.

so that was the first one. 

we were pretty excited to have witnessed this, and a little shaken up by it too. we started talking about ufos etc. while looking straight up at the sky to see if anything else was there. 

after a few minutes of neck straining i thought nothing was coming. every plane would catch our attention for a moment until we ruled it out as ordinary. it was looking at one of these planes that my eye caught the second boomerang craft. 

i could not believe i was lucky enough to be seeing this again. we got a longer look at this one, maybe 20 seconds or so before it blended in to the clouds to the north. 

it looked exactly like the first one and had the exact same flight path. i checked the time after we saw it, and it came about 15 minutes after the first one, at 7:00pm on the dot.  

we were basically dumbfounded at this point. and sat waiting and watching for anything else that might appear. nothing came. 

it is the next day as i write this, and i'm pretty blown away by what i witnessed last night.

i hope somebody else saw this besides my girlfriend and i.
content.summary: 2 bommerang' shaped, massive, craft flew in straight flight path directly overhead. no lights. no sound. objects appeared approx 15 minutes apart

content.detailedDescription:
I have grown up in washington state and i believe i have been abducted since i was very young. my parents had close encounters of the first kind on tv and i was petrified of the part at the end with the alien using sign. everyone makes fun of me and scares me all of the time as some kind of a joke. its not. i still have problems sleeping at night. i used to stay up all night till the sun comes up because it feels like someone can take you and do whatever they want to you at the same time. not human. but human at the same time.Scares me. i never talk about it hoping it stays away...At the same time i want to understand it. i believe why i am so scared of their faces is because i was abducted. i also have bad dreams from when i was little everything was calm and quiet and all of a sudden it was crazy but i cant remember. can anyone help me?
?

mike.
content.summary: Happens. i dont want any attention. just thought you might be able to give some advise.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear crisp early morning about 12:30-12:45 am.  2 friends and myself were walking their dog before going to sleep for the evening, when gazing at the sky while walking i noticed a red lantern type object in the nw part of the sky that slowly began to head toward us descending at the same time. it was clearly not a star, comet/asteroid or baloon.  i would assume it was less than a mile from us before it shifted direction east and ascended meandering up and down going farther north east until it disappears out of view.   it did not hold a flight pattern like anything i have seen.   it remarkably resembled those red chinese lanterns they light for prayer, though this was not constructed from paper nor was it a baloon.  the red was a constant color with no flickering lights or light beams.    the 3 of us were pretty sure we just witnessed a space craft of some sort.  it was awesome, though we went home and just went on with our lives, not thinking to do something or tell someone about it.  
it wasn't until feb 2012, when visiting those same friends, when they showed me a video of similar red lantern type ufo's, but in clusters of 10 or 15, did i really believe what i had seen the previous year.  the last minute of the viral video "mass media ufo sightings" has several of the exact same type of red lantern ufo's.  the moment i saw the red, it made the hair stand up all over my body.     i decided to file this report to see if there have been similar sightings.  i did not take any pictures.  the mass media ufo video has the red lanterns, for your reference.
content.summary: Red lantern type ufo changing directions abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed this sighting around 2am on a thursday night in myrtle beach, sc while i was staying in the wyndham resort/hotel on vacation. i was up in my room outside on the balcony at the 12th floor which was pretty high up so i looked out towards the street enjoying the view and noticed in the sky, not up in the sky it was more straight ahead from the height i was already at maybe a bit higher than i was, a bright orange ball pulsating like a dimmer switch on and off. 

the direction it came from was the north and i observed it as it moved silently across the sky towards the south running parallel with the coastline but on the land side not the ocean side.  i eventually lost site of the object as it left my field of view. at first glance i couldn't figure out what it actually was but then came to the conclusion after gathering myself from being in shock that it couldn't of been anything else except an ufo! not a plane, helicopter, balloon, satellite or star. i know what i saw that night.
content.summary: On the balcony of my hotel and spotted a pulsating orange ball of light moving from north to south along inner coastline

content.detailedDescription: Went outside because my littlest dog was very upset. bigger dog was in yard staring at the sky. looked up because i thought she might be looking at a rat in the chicken coop rafters and saw a large glowing orb in the sky. thought "is that a plane?" orb was moving nw then suddenly stopped, flashed very bright white - possibly with yellow outer circle.Like a pulse flash then moved se. i thought "no way is that a plane" then it went crazy fast & disappeared. i thought "did that just happen? what did i just see?" stared at empty sky trying to figure out some explanation for it. went in and told my kid / texted my spouse. went back out around 15 min.Saw a plane/helecopter(?) at se area. bigger dog ran into house and hid under bed & would not come out/shaking. smaller dog ( more aggressive) was guarding back door afterwards for about 10 min. would not budge - very not like her. dogs relaxed after about 30 min. but human witness still freaking about it.
content.summary: Glowing orb pulsed, changed direction then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was feeding horses about 8:30 the night of august 25, 2013. my friend had been outside of my barn messing around in the grass. he asked me a few times to come outside and see what he was seeing, i did ignore him. but then i decided to go outside because he was getting agitated, asking me what it was he was looking at. i walked out of the barn and he pointed in the sky. when i saw a disc shaped object, with flashing red, yellow, blue, and white lights, hovering above my horse pasture in the sky. when seeing the object it was to the right of a light pole( the light pole approximately 30 ft from me) and it was a little further above my pasture. about 120-150 feet away from me and my friend.
my friend, who is younger than i was getting a bit uneasy and worried. as we watched the object was flashing these lights then all of the sudden the lights lit up all white! my friend and i instantly looked at eachother to make sure we were seeing the same things! i just then remember to pull out my phone, and video it! i recorded the object heading south west in a straight line towards  i-35. with the lights flashing all different colors again. i believe i missed some time between the object being lot up all white and then returning back to flashing all different colors. i instantly ran inside and grabbed a pistol when the object was out of sight just to be sure. i told my sister, and she did not believe me at first! but with me and my friend both telling her she changed her mind. i felt extremely emotional while this was going on. i wanted to cry my eyes out.  in the video you are observing the flashing light moving across the sky is the object. you hear me and my friend arguing about it and you can here the shakiness in my voice.
content.summary: Friend and i saw disc shaped object hovering above horse pasture. the slowy leave. videoed flashing lights with  phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the navy aboard the uss jason ar-8. we were miles off the coast of california, although the ship was berthed out of san diego, ca. i was on port forward watch around 4am, when i noticed a white light above and in the distance appeared to get closer to earth. it first appeared like a star, but then grew larger upon approach. i alerted the starboard forward watch regarding what i thought i was seeing and he confirmed. radar onboard did not detect anything, and as we were observing one red orb exited to the left and took off at a high rate of speed and disappeared off horizon. moments later a second red orb took of from the right of white orb in same fashion. by this time the captain, and all other officers where on deck with binoculars and i pointed out stationary white orb. as all where focusing on white orb, both red orbs returned and seemed to dock behind the white orb. the white orb then ascended from position until no longer visible.,
content.summary: Observed white orb high into atmosphere. one red orb exited left side of white orb. another red orb exited right side of white orb shortly after. white orb stayed stationary, while red orbs left feild of sight. approx. 20 min later returned

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down bonnie view road, there was previously a ufo sighted on a street that runs parallel to it. there is an area where cattle that is picked up by the sheriff from owners is taken. it is fenced in and there is no way to go inside aside from it being illegal. i stopped next to it on the road to look at a white horse which seemed as if it was spooked by something. next thing i know i saw a human like creature with scales looking very reptilian lying on the ground then getting up and walking deeper into the fenced area. i was shocked but there was still a huge distance between me and the creature so i dont think it even noticed me looking at it. i didnt know whether to call the police or just leave but within seconds a very mysterious weird looking disk dropped down to the ground very fast in the direction that the creature was walking. it did it so fast that its hard to even see what it is as it comes down like a bubble in water and only stays on the ground for a few seconds but while its on the ground it seems to be glowing in a cloak of fading invisibility almost like white light it was as if i was seeing it through an old tv. it was like it just kept trying to hide but then all of a sudden it rose right back up and disappeared into the sky. i was unable to take pictures since my phone was out of battery but i know for a fact it happened, the trees look as if they have been hit by a very strong wind and if nobody goes in to investigate the area, the sheriff will go in clueless about anything that happened. i have no idea if there is any debree or radiation because i just drove away shocked and really scared to my home but you can tell even now by looking at the area that something unusual was there.
content.summary: Reptile like creature seen picked up by a space ship like ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from walking my girlfriend to her bus stop (about three blocks away from my house). on my walk back, i started hearing helicopters, and i looked up and saw two stationary orb-type lights in the sky, with a helicopter flying to the right of them. having no idea what the hell the lights were, i ran the rest of the way home to grab my cellphone to record them ("my girlfriend won't believe me" were my thoughts at the time). when i got home i got my cellphone and ran out to my balcony and started filming. at first there was only one helicopter, then eventually two. the two objects in the sky were stationary for about 10 minutes total, i barely saw any movement. i had finished recording (3 clips in total and one picture) and decided to text my girlfriend one of the pictures. by the time i sent the text, the objects were pretty much out of view, they had traveled farther north, past my field of view.
content.summary: Two stationary ufos, with helicopter to the right (observing most likely)

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister were in our apartment when she told me to come look she saw a dragon so i went over in disbelief and looked and saw a dragon i know it was one. and i saw it again today.
content.summary: It was a dragon i swear

content.detailedDescription: The first time i was about 13 years old i think a bright fireball like object fall behind trees aimed for a crash. i was so scared i just ran in the house the old simpson's came on. i remember how the simpson's came on cause of what took place outside that night. cause if u look at the simpson's they take the camera underground and u see the cartoon ufo. and i thought to myself that's what i seen it was a ufo but not  same kind. just a coincidence this happen for a reason type deal. but if u want to dismiss it for a falling star, u can my sister seen it to. second time... unmistakable can't be dismissed! so one night dad ask me and my brother to go get kerosene he had just got off work so my brother was driving i wanted to ride cause he had the best car out at that time i was looking for the girls. needless to say he pulled down to the end of the drive way i looked to the right all i could say is. "you see that? lets go down there. " he said "hell naw."and last thing i remember about that night was that. i don't remember going to the store. i don't remember coming back from the store. i'm not saying i was abducted maybe everything after was so insignificant after i witness that.  i mean it was huge or it could be huge for a 15 year old where anything looks huge. it was silver disc shape look as if it had windows like riding by someone house at night with no curtains up and just a light on. i didn't see aliens people nothing on the inside maybe we didn't stay long enough i don't know. glad we didn't! that wasn't the weird part the weird part was after that a 1 year or so after they built a military/air force after that there in this small town.Coincidence? maybe but it makes you wonder. so 2012-13 i started telling people about what i seen. and come to find out they also had some accounts with unidentified flying objects
content.summary: 2 accounts

content.detailedDescription: Was getting ready to go to bed and as i pass my window i saw something with 4 or 5 lights at the bottom of the object slowly going on and off it was flying very slowly down the road right in front of my house. i could see the shape of the object it's outline stood out against the night sky. the light's came on and off slowly that's when saw it had round windows and i could see inside there was faint light inside and i could see the wall inside with what looked like bolts or rivets running down a seam. that's when i got afraid that i might see who was in there. the object went slowly just above the tree's and stopped right above the tree's where the creek was, then the light's started to flash all over the object in a pattern, it looked like it changed shape but it might have been just the light's that made it look that way, then it went straight down into the tree's but there's no place for something that big to land because it just dense woods, it never made a sound nothing, it was the last i saw of it. i went down and looked the next day to see if i could find where it went but there was no sigh of a landing anywhere no tree's broke nothing. i have been calling it a object but what i saw was a machine i don't know who was flying it but it was a machine. the light's changing on it was really something to see. i was no more than a 100 foot away as i looked at it and no more than 500 foot when it went straight down. a couple of years ago i told my grandson what i had seen when i was young and he ask me something that i didn't have a answer for, he ask me why i wasn't like the people on tv who spent years looking for ufo's. i still don't why i didn't tell everybody i saw and why i was not afraid the next day or even now it was like it wasn't very important. that is what has been bothering me ever since my grandson ask me that question. i have never seen a picture or drawing that was the same shape i saw.
content.summary: I was going to bed when i looked out my window and saw something with lights and round windows i could see inside.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 17,2014 (yesterday) son and i were yesterday march 17,2014 at mount charleston, nevada. we went hiking and around 10:15 in the morning, i took two pictures of the sun and in one of them a ufo appeared in my picture. when i took the second picture it was gone.
i didn't notice the object until i checked my camera in the car returning home. i guess the unidentified object was traveling toward the sun. 
it looks like a very large object to me. it is dull gray, but behind it has some kind of tube or something like that and at the end a very shinning blue aura.
i felt happy, always wanted to see one.
content.summary: While in mount charleston, nevada, yesterday i took two pictures of the sun and in one i got a ufo
content.locationName: It was in Mount Charlesto, Nevada

content.detailedDescription: What  i remember is this object above the tree lines in pevine alberta.Me and my friends were up to nothing as pevine is a metis colony in northend alberta near high praire. its a place where theres only a dirt road goes in and out.Its in the middle of the bushes.Its just a place with a few houses and a school.Well anyways i was looking out the frount window of the house and above the trees i seen this bluises purple orange object just silently hovering above it was big.It looked like a egg.I thout what the hell is that? like i said what is that ? it hoverd there doing nothing.Thene i turn to my ffiends you see that . when i turn back it was gone. i was more curios what it was. my friends were watching it too.I wasn't scared jus   t wondering what did i just see.To this day i still a wonder what did see that night?
content.summary: It looked like a big colored egg

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was driving our car towards nacogdoches from our home, about six miles west from the sighting. we had left the house around 6:30 for a 7:00 movie in town. the drive takes about 17 minutes. i was a passenger in the front seat. i noticed a red flashing light to my right (south) as we neared a known natural gas well sight, about six minutes from our home off fm 343. i kept my eyes on the object, noticing it didn't move. i remember the outside lights were not on, like usual. he kept driving since we were heading into town for a movie. the disc-like object had a red light that slowly moved back and forth at the bottom. my husband said it was probably a tower. i kept my eyes on it until we had driven too far and it was no longer in sight. after several days, i finally went by the home located near by and asked the owner about what had happened. she was out of town that night and said there was no tower. i did not notice any burning around the natural gas well. i was unable to take a photo because i didn't want to stop looking at it long enough to fumble around in my purse for a cellphone with lower quality photo capabilities.

i was mostly frustrated because my husband wouldn't stop the car so i could get a better look at it.
content.summary: The craft was hovering above a known natural gas well just off the fm road we were driving on.

content.detailedDescription: The circular shaped object came into view as me and my brother played in the backyard. the object was so close, an adult could have touched it if standing on the house. when the object came into view, my brother was terrified and screaming for it to go away. however, i remember feeling as though the object was playful and i was screaming for it to land. it drifted slowly over our heads within around 20 ft off the ground. it was a vibrating sound and continued over the house. my bother says that it jetted up into the air, but i dont remember that part. we were both witnesses to this amazing event. the object had 4 larg domed lights on bottom that had a soft milky white glow. i have told this story to mufon before. looking on google earth at where this event took place, there is an apparent trail over the tree where the path of this object was. it is all dead. if these trees were tested, they may still hold evidence of the craft. as for me, it has haunted me my entire life. we never tell people of this event, because they laugh or brush it off. it was such a significant event, i felt as though i should not tell people that wouldnt understand.
content.summary: Ufo was circular with four white dome lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
On or around october 17, 1973 during that evening, my sister and i were watching the sonny and cher comedy hour, upstairs and my mother and older brother were watching the world series.  our mother came up screaming for us to change the tv channel to 10 which is the columbia, sc station.  the weather man joe pinner was reporting that a ufo was hovering over the columbia airport.  we thought wow changed the tv back to cbs to watch the show.  about 20 minutes or so later the tv reception started messing up but with rabbit ears they always do then there was a strange humming sound inside the house.  my sister and i had no clue why until our brother yelled for us to get down stairs that something was hovering over our house, which was a 2 story brick house and the main tv was attached to an antenna outside the house.  on our way down stairs our mother had gone out the front door to see what was going on and our brother locked her out she was screaming beating on the door and the dogs were howling in their pens.  i got to the door first and got it opened it to let her in or go out and see what was going on.  as i looked up above the house some 500 ft. up was and oval shaped object  approximately the size of our house making no sound outside but the inside of the house was still humming.  the object seemed to float around until you could hear the sound of jets in the distance then the object started to move off to the north east, when the jets came into sight the object seemed to gain altitude then it looked like it left the jets standing still.  in one second gone from sight.  when we went back in the same reporter was on tv saying that authorities said that the object was just weather balloon.  my mother, sister and i slept together that night our father was in atlanta on business and our brother barricaded himself into his bedroom with his guns.  
the object was oval with lights on the bottom maybe eight to twelve none were blinking just sort of pulsating dimmer then brighter.
this is me thinking back when i was 6 years old at that time i drew a sketch of the object.  it was not until my mother���s death when we were going through her stuff that some of the drawings were found.  of course at that time or anytime people may think you are crazy so we never talked about it much after we told our father when he got home.
content.summary: Ufo over columbia airport

content.detailedDescription:
It turns out that i live in a ���condominio��� in the rural area of jaboticatubas mg. in the early hours of 3/14/14 around the 03:50 morning i woke up with my wife to see how i was passing my stepson who was unwell. coming out of my balcony my wife called me as noticed on the left side of our house (place where the sun rises-east) had a "star" much larger than the other and with very intense brightness and sparkly. she looked to the naked eye, don't move, however started to take some pictures with your cell phone and your computer we noticed some kind of change of ways.
i got my camera ge a730 digital compact 7 megapixel of because she has some resources to take night shots and fireworks. in this way took multiple photos then the supposed "star" that at first i thought it was "vesper" or something. to view these photos that i was careful to take in several adjustments to my machine we were stunned because the object took on photos unexplained formats. i've always been careful to support the camera a "tripod" improvised because i've been a photographer of the company's products that i worked in 80 years and knew of the possibility of causing inadequate effects without the correct support of the camera.
returning to the phenomenon, are several photos where the object appears to change shape every second dramatically. however i observed characteristics that are repeated: the light that emits in the pictures we took with "fireworks" is always white with several points that seem to "pink suckers". there is also a point always with white light stronger on all photos. in a few moments the object appears to join and form a more compact mass. suddenly there is a mutation in seconds and the same expands into several "tentacles" strangers with several points in these so-called "pink suckers".

the photos are extraordinary, shocking as you will be able to see. i've never seen anything like these programs that sometimes we see on tv.   the phenomenon didn't happen in the early hours of the next day (3/15/14 day) however in the early hours of today-3/16/14 happened again and saw around 04:00 a.M..  i'm forwarding some pictures in sequence of this phenomenon (in two days) and i would please that the same were analysed
content.summary: With naked eyes brigthly and pulsating by the camera constantly changing the shape

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog and the moon was very bright i could see stars but this wasn't a star the light was moving slow at first i tought it was a shooting star but than it turned bright green in color and it moved fast across the sky than the light made a quick stop out of the no where and shoot out in the opposite direction at very high speed and it had like some kind of tail of light and just disappeared in the sky with a bright light like something swallowed it it was weird i stood there in amaze i did not know what to think of it but that was no star i don't think a star can be moving that fast stop and than take off and disappeared that fast.
content.summary: Bright green light moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
On back patio in hot tub star gassing. ufo was much larger than 747. not  sure at first? followed plane for about 3mins then went east for about 25miles then back to where it was. stopped over town a couple miles away 
hovered there for about 11min's then went out of view staigth up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched ufo for about 20 min. 3 people and i.Ufo when out of v[ew by going stragth up

content.detailedDescription: Just happened to look out back door and saw lights circling. i listened and heard no sound. went to get our 6.5mm high powered rifle. being 8 yrs. old and scared i was going to try and bring it down. my dad grabbed the rifle just in time.  we watched it  till it was out of sight.  thousands of people called the police tv, and radio stations. on the news the next day, they said it was a blimp  advertising merita bread. why at night when no body could read the ad??The "blimp" was never seen in the daytime.
content.summary: Saw lights circling. was 8 yrs. old. took high powered outside. was aiming on it when dad grabbed gun barrels. we both watched till it was out of sight. had forgotten about it till i saw the identical thing on the history channel, somewhere out west.

content.detailedDescription: Throughout the evening, i had been going in and out of the house and had looked up and noticed a light that had more color and brightness than the other stars. i mentioned it to my dad,son and a family friend so we all started paying attention to the star. my son brought out his camera,which he had just purchased that has an excellent zoom lens on it. he zoomed in and the we observed a round object with rotating light! blue ,white and red. we stood and watch for about 40 mins. went in the house came back and it was gone.
content.summary: My son and i were standing in the yard, lookina into the sky through his new nikon camera and noticed a bright light hovering above us, we zoomed in and saw the object

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving office and seen a black rusty aircraft hovering. it was seen through my windshield. the aircraft was very old looking and seem to be beat up. it was black with scratches and rust. it had wings that had a slight bend to them. the aircraft was rounded on one end like the end of a bee and the other end almost had a cylinder shape. the aircraft hovered for a few seconds and birds were circling it in the sky. i went to grab my phone to take a photo but when i looked up the craft was gone, but the birds were still there circling. they stayed in that spot for a few moments. as soon as i had a chance i drew a sketch of what i seen just so i wouldn't forget. i have included that photo. i didn't feel much except i knew what i saw and that no one would probably believe me. i told a friend and he just laughed so i have kept it quiet since.
content.summary: Black hovering aircraft with panels. rusty and old looking. flying above buildings. birds circling craft.

content.detailedDescription: While the russian sputnik 1 was over montgomery county maryland my parents and myself were observing it - it was going blink blink blink i had to go inside for a few minutes and my parents stayed outside watching the sputnik. when i came back outside my parents were very excited as they told me a light came from outer space and placed itself right next to the sputnik and followed along for a few seconds and then flew back out into outer space.As i missed seeing it my self i was very disappointed. my parents were amazed. from what i heard the next few days was that the montgomery county police phone lines were so packed they failed as everyone that was watching the sputnik saw the object and called the police.
content.summary: The object came to observe the sputnik

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shaped that was on camera but did not notice till viewing screenshot
content.summary: Was filming stars and captured image on camera

content.detailedDescription:
my husband was in the backyard and saw one red orange glowing orb moving fast across the sky: from 30 degrees above the horizon sse to nnw .  i was doing dishes and he called me outside.  i saw a glowing orb following that same path, ran inside to get binoculars, got outside again within seconds and then 2 more followed.  it took each one about 20 seconds to travel across the sky.  they appeared low in the sky from the southwest and passed by us at about 70 degrees from the horizon going towards the north west. they made no sound.  there was no trail behind them.  we both thought they were nothing we had seen before:  not the space station or satellites, which we've seen before, nor shooting stars.  we though ufo.  it was very exciting.    they all stopped glowing when they reached about 45 degrees from the north west horizon but were still seen as black objects following the same trajectory but disappearing from view at about 30 degrees from the horizon.  the sky was clear and it was still fairly light outside with constellations visible. it was not windy at all.  
then a plane went from the north to the south in the direction they came from.  the sound of the plane was behind the sight of the plane  so it must have been going quite fast.
content.summary: Glowing red orange orbs flew overhead and went dark at 45 degrees above horizon north west but dark outline visible still

content.detailedDescription: Fortunately for me i have been blessed by 2 sightings ..1 which i just sent to you about an hour ago... 1959 in ont. ..This second sighting was in nova scotia..5 of us fellows were at a friends hunting camp nov 11 1995 ?? have to check camp log to make sure of the year 1995 is close..We had just finished supper when i had to go out to have a pee,when i noticed something hovering just above the trees at the east end of the lake about a mile or so .I called the other fellows to come and have a look ...It was cigar shape and had from what we could see at least 4 or 5 windows something similar to a big airplane ,  windows were dimly lit. thats all we could see. we watch it move from our right to our left in a northerly direction until it disappeared,there was not a sound ..It was deafenately some sort of airborne vessel ...In my estimation the cloud cover was at about 200 ft. agl ..Because i was a pilot for the dept of n.R. i had a dept. radio with me i called the radio room to verify that all of our helicopters were at the hangar. of course they were they would not have been out anyway but i had to confirm. i had the radio room call halifax contol tower to verify that there was nothing on the radar or any aircraft out there and there wasnt ..The ufo just disappeared without a sound ...We had not had a drink yet but we sure made up for it later
content.summary: Deer hunting season ufo sighting at camp

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:05-8:13pm on monday march 17th, i was talking my dog for a walk and witnessed what at first i thought was a oddly colored airplane in the night sky. the object was bright orange. sort of oblong shaped it seemed. the light was not flashing as airplanes tend to do but instead pulsated as it moved slowly and silently across the sky. i noticed the flight pattern actually seemed to ascend and descend slowly. which i figured maybe turbulence if it did happened to be a plane. but the movement was very fluid and seemed to be going up and down at equal distances. it slowed to a hovering stop above the horizon at about a 30-45 degrees in the western sky from my position (off 21st st. in newark ohio, 43055). the light appeared to be hovering over the town of granville about a mile away or two away to the west. the pulsating of the orange light seems to slow and get dimmer and dimmer with each pulse until it vanished out of sight. it did not appear to actually be moving farther away but dimmed as one would lower a kitchen light with a dimmer switch slowly. at which point i came back in to file this sighting. i did not wait for a reappearance or any other events which in hindsight i'm kicking myself for. from the time i noticed the object to the time it stopped was about 30-45 seconds approximately. it hovered for about 15 seconds before i had lost sight of it.

unfortunately i didn't have my phone on me so i have no pictures or videos to back up this report but i hope it helps.
content.summary: Hovering silent pulsating bright orange light over granville (area) slowing to a stop and then fading to nothing
